$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Smile|Askr was actually fool enough to
enter an area under the shadow
of Lady Embla's command...$k$pHe's no better than that retainer
of his!$k$p$EFace_Smile2|No need to draw this out. I'll finish
this myself while Lady Embla rests.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMEID_エルム,ch00_40_Elm_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Tch... You've passed this little test,
but there will be more to come!$k$p
